game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Most themes can be previewed at https://github.com/retropie/ RetroPie-Setup/wiki/themes.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ascii file manager for linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.

game.name: Run Command Configuration
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Show IP
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a wifi network and configure wifi settings.

game.name: Background Music
game.desc: The mpg123 music script has been installed in this build to play MP3/WAV files during menu navigation in both Emulation Station and Attract Mode. A special folder in /roms has been created called music. This folder is used to place your MP3/WAV files into. Once done, restart the system and they will begin automatically playing. Once you launch a game, the music will stop. Upon exiting out of a game, the music will begin playing again.

game.name: Reset All Controllers
game.desc: It will reset all ES cotroller configurations and remove any previous controller profiles. This will give you a clean controllers setup!

game.name: Audio
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default of auto, 3.5mm jack, or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Media Removal Util
game.desc: This utility will remove extra media files (mixart, boxart, cartart, snap and wheel) for a chosen system when there is not a matching game/rom for it. Mixart tweak added.

game.name: OverScan On/Off
game.desc: This script will let quickly enable or disable the overscan setting.

game.name: Launching Screens
game.desc: This script will enable or disable the use of launching screens. Launching screensets are located here: /home/pi/RetroPie/LaunchingScreens Each set of launching screens you have located there must be in their own parent folder, with the individual emulator system folders containing the launching.png files underneath.

game.name: Switch Genesis-Megadrive
game.desc: This script will switch between the Sega Genesis and the Sega Megadrive themes in both ES and AM to show in the main menu. You will need to restart Emulation Station after making the change. By SUPREME TEAM

game.name: Bootup Theme Randomizer
game.desc: Utility to enable or disable random themes upon Emulation Station bootup.

game.name: Bezel Custom Sets
game.desc: You can enable or disable custom folder bezels such as Motion Blue #2 set or future sets.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Joystick Selection
game.desc: Select which joystick to use for RetroArch players 1-4 (global or system specific).

game.name: OverClock RPI4
game.desc: Overclock your Pi4.

game.name: Raspberry Video Output
game.desc: This script will let quickly let you change video output. Some ex 1080P,720P,480P,240P.

game.name: System Info
game.desc: View a summary of your Retropie system info, temperature, partition info, ip

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on RetroPie boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: Clear Last Played
game.desc: The user friendly Game list cleaner

game.name: RetroPie Video Loading screen
game.desc: Enable or Disable video loading screen.

game.name: Raspi-Config
game.desc: Change user password, boot options, internationalization, camera, add your pi to Rastrack, overclock, overscan, memory split, SSH and more.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: Joystick Selection
game.desc: Select which joystick to use for RetroArch players 1-4 (global or system specific).

game.name: Bezel Project
game.desc: Download and manage games bezels.

game.name: RetroPie Setup
game.desc: Official Retropie Setup script! Audio settings, RetroPie main install-update, install extra packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares as well as other RetroPie-related configurations.
